title: Event Handler Simulation
description: Create a Button class that stores a click handler lambda and calls it when clicked.
instructions: Create a Button class that stores a click handler lambda and calls it when clicked.

hints.text: onClick is a lambda with no parameters
Call lambda like a function: onClick()
() -> Unit means function that takes nothing and returns nothing

commonMistakes.correction: Use ?. for safe calls, ?: for elvis operator

commonMistakes.mistake: Using var when val would suffice
